Package Main.MVC

This package holds the java files related to the MVC design pattern. The Model is the GameBoard, the Controller is GameBoardController and the View is GameBoardRenderer. BrickBreaker is where the update and render loop is called and the user inputs are obtained. GameEngine is where the MVC classes are initialised and the user inputs are processed and Renderer is the interface which GameBoardRenderer implements.
  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Renderer
    Public interface Renderer is used to create an interface for renderers to be created.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    BrickBreaker
    Public class BrickBreaker is responsible for loading in the GameEngine to start generating the game.
    GameBoard
    Public class GameBoard is the Model of the MVC design pattern and is responsible for holding all the entity information of the game such as bricks, ball and player.
    GameBoardController
    Public class GameBoardController is the Controller of the MVC design pattern and is responsible for processing all the entity behaviour in the game.
    GameBoardRenderer
    Public class GameBoardRenderer is the View of the MVC design pattern and is responsible for rendering all the graphics in the game.
    GameEngine
    Public class GameBoard is responsible for loading in the GameBoard, Controller and Renderer.
